verses.name: Job 27:7
verses.text: Let mine enemy be as the wicked, and he that riseth up against me as the unrighteous.

verses.name: Job 27:8
verses.text: For what is the hope of the hypocrite, though he hath gained, when God taketh away his soul?

verses.name: Job 27:9
verses.text: Will God hear his cry when trouble cometh upon him?

verses.name: Job 27:10
verses.text: Will he delight himself in the Almighty? will he always call upon God?

verses.name: Job 27:11
verses.text: I will teach you by the hand of God: that which is with the Almighty will I not conceal.

verses.name: Job 27:12
verses.text: Behold, all ye yourselves have seen it; why then are ye thus altogether vain?
